DOC.HEADLINE: COMMUNITY NEWS FOCUS : BREA ; HUMAN_RIGHTS DAY TO BE RECOGNIZED DEC . 10
DOC.TEXT: Human_Rights Day will be celebrated Dec . 10 at the Brea United Methodist_Church to recognize the 46th anniversary of the signing of the Universal Declaration of Human_Rights by the United Nations . Amnesty International of Orange County , the American Assn . of University Women of La Habra and Brea , and the United Nations of Orange County are sponsoring the event to promote awareness of the inherent dignity , rights and freedoms of people everywhere , organizers said . The event begins at 9 a.m. and will feature a performance by the International Children ' s Choir from 10:15 to 11 a.m. The church is at 480 State College Blvd . MIMI KO
